data.title: Heart's Desire
data.meta_description: Read 3. Fate from the story Heart's Desire by Sincerelybrashae with 17,055 reads. thug, urbanfiction, maturelanguage.  March 20, 2020  | Harlem, New York2:36 PM
data.text:
March 20, 2020 | Harlem, New York

2:36 PM

These niggas for everybody

These niggas for everybody

You say you'll never be his wifey

As if you ever had the option

The way dem tittes sag

Milk that gon' bad bitch, I promise he ain't coppin'

Everybody know you boppin

The whole hood know you fair play

That little change that he throw yo way

Hoe, I spend that shit everyday

This was my shit, so when I shuffled my playlist while driving and it came on I felt like I had to put on a whole performance.

I was on the way to the mall to find a outfit for my birthday which was April 12th, graduation and also just because shopping literally brought me peace. Even though I don't go out much, I had to make sure whenever I did step out I was looking good from head to toe. Just as the song ended I got a incoming call from Jayda.

"Hey boo, where you at?" She asked

"Hey girl, on the way to the mall, You know I have to get a birthday, and graduation fit. Where you at?"

"At the house, why you ain't ask me to come to the mall with you? Fake ass bitch.."

I laughed "Bitch. Please don't act like you don't have two whole ass boyfriend that you be with 25/8 ..You coulda been boo'd up for all I know"

"Oh whateva, ima let you have this one" She said laughing with me "So what we doin for your birthday?" She asked

"Girl, I'm really not trying to do much." I told her honestly. Birthday's don't even feel the same anymore.

"You heard from Marco ass?"

"Who?" I said playing dumb and she laughed

"Bitch don't play stupid."

"No I haven't heard from him. I wouldn't be surprised if Saint off'd his midget ass foreal." I said nonchalantly

She bussed out laughing before catching her breath.

"Bitch you evil. Don't act like you don't care bout ya man now." She cackled

"Girl, fuck him. Once the word hoe came out his mouth he was dead to me."

"It's okay, your new nigga saved the day." She said being funny

"Here you go again, I don't even know him like that."

I said laughing

"Not yet, but when you end up with what's his name... East" She paused to laugh "Ima be like I told you so hoe"

"See now you being funny. I was never calling him that shit, you know I don't play nicknames with these niggas" I said making her laugh. I was always calling niggas by they government, you not bouta make me call you what everybody else does. That's whack
